experience.title: Software Developer
description: Working on multiple projects, collaborating with team members to build out new features and improve existing ones.
Frontend team lead for internal project, helping with development and delegating tasks to junior devs.
Set up Stripe payment integration and Postmark email integration for internal project.
Collaborate with team members effectively to meet project deadlines.
Proactively identifying existing issues and developing effective solutions for bug fixes to improve user experience.
Pick up new technologies as needed for different projects.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Developed multiple frontend features and collaborated with team members to oversee deployment process and ensure the feature was rolled out by the deadline
Led the conversion and deployment of multiple repositories to a single-spa architecture, improving site performance, code maintainability and scalability
Engaged in knowledge sharing with team members which helped with the success of the conversion and future work
Collaborated with QA to implement end-to-end testing for critical pages, ensuring the reliability and functionality of the platform across different scenarios
Proactively identified existing issues and developed effective solutions for bug fixes to improve user experience

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer II
description: Worked in an agile scrum team of eight to develop an e-commerce full-stack application using React, Java with Spring Boot and Spring Security, and Jest
Independently designed and built a management system full-stack application using React, Java with Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Jest, and JUnit
Selected to feature in an interview video shoot to share my software developer journey which is published on the company site
